markdownRemark.html:
There are a lot of problems in our country that I think should be addressed in the next five years to ten years.

  • Traffic eating up Manila’s productivity. It is estimated that we lose 3.5 billion pesos (66 million USD) DAILY.

  • Degredation of natural resources is taking its toll and affecting human lives. Soil erosion has killed 90 people and others missing in two separate locations in a span of a week.
